message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%. We can adjust if you'd like.
I'll give you a better deal. Let's split it 60/40, but I'll take the bigger share this time.
Let's try to be more even this time. I'll take 5500, and you can have 4500. We're both losing money with each round, so let's find a solution that works for both of us.
I'm willing to compromise and split it 50/50. Let's meet in the middle and take 5000 each. It's the fairest way to end this game.
